name: dan miller
text: Pizza was ok not as good as before covid, eatin dinning was a joke

name: Michael Humphrey
text: Good service, the food was superb. It was real quiet because of the Covid, but it was nice. Bathrooms were very clean and very accessible. Very hospitable.

name: Angela Rhodes
text: All was good. I opted for curbside assistance so I didn't have to pay a mask on and go in. Sadly our pizza wasn't hot when I got it home due to not knowing. Curbside was not able to be completed, so I went inside to get our dinner . Thank you.

name: Hope Greer
text: It was great! We ate inside and the pizza, cheese bread, and pasta was amazing!! The server was very attentive and helpful!! Will be going back.

name: Michael Minor
text: A fly cooked in the breadsticks and "Brittney" was an aweful rude server. Will not be back.

name: Todd Winters
text: Pizza taste like the bread sticks and wings did that came with my order.

name: Christy Allen
text: Great Food! Friendly Staff!

name: Medgie Parsons
text: Best pizza in town .wonderful service. Thank you pizza hut!!

name: Gary Watts
text: Their pizza is unique among pizza. I like thin crust because it is so crunchy. The salad bar is not the largest but the offerings are 100%.

name: Nicole & Roger MARTIN
text: My kids wont order from anyone else. They go out of their way to make sure each order to made correctly and hot and ready. Love each and everyone of them.

name: Cindy Greendale
text: Very very poor customer service. Was not at all satisfied with the way the manager, or workers treated my daughter and I. How's about working on a "the customer is always right" business outlook? #yikes #saveyourselves #donoteathere

name: Jeff Stokes
text: Very poor customer service. Manager, or at least the woman who appeared to be the manager, was extremely rude and unhelpful. She had a very sarcastic attitude and was very rude when redirecting me towards to COVID-19 shield. Did not feel …More

name: Brian Swearingenk
text: Buttery garlic crust was amazing

name: Walter Grayson
text: I have been to this place a couple of time with my lady friend before. And had bad service then. I was with her and she wanted to go there again so I went along.  Again I got the same slow bad service again and the pizza wasn't even done this time. I will guarantee that I wont ever waste my time or money there again.

name: Heather Tucker
text: Great dinner.  Food was delicious and there service was stellar.

name: Rotricia Bruyarcos
text: We order online for pick up because of great specials. We order garlic thin crust with pepperoni mushrooms black olives. This one is like foccacia bread pizza from Italy. Sometimes we dine in and the atmosphere is cozy and the staff is nice.

name: Kelsey Brasfield
text: Love eating here. Great family-like environment.

name: Steve Shingledecker
text:
Had a great experience in Camden Pizza Hut, our waitress, Rachel was superb!!! If she isn't the manager, she should be at the top of your list!!
Steve & Cheryl

text: The greatest pizza, they do everything they can to ensure your visit is perfect. Mike makes the best pizza in town.

name: Janet Ross
text: My sister and her husband ordered out pizza from Pizza Hut for their 3rd anniversary. They were nice enough to share. It was the best pizza I have had lately. Her husband had a heart attack and has been very ill. He is in rehabilitation in Camden TN.

text: Quality of pizza hut has fallen in the last few years, sauce on pizza is not good. Funny tasting spice on crust edge, not the top five pizza in my opinion any more!!
